attributes.action: Organise a thorough reappraisal of the existing evidence for and against the hypothesis that HIV causes AIDS to be conducted by a suitable independent group.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is widely believed by the general public that a retrovirus called
HIV causes the group of diseases called AIDS. Many biomedical
scientists question this hypothesis. Many books have been published, several documentaries made and hundreds of top scientists and medical doctors have publicly questioned this hypothesis. It is time for a thorough reappraisal of the existing evidence for and against this hypothesis to
be conducted by a suitable independent group. Further that epidemiological studies be devised and undertaken.

rejection.details: We will not accept an e-petition so willfully inaccurate. The scientific consenus is clear. HIV causes AIDS.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
